title: F/S T206 "Amazing A's and a Frill"
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: F/S T206 "Amazing A's and a Frill"
posts.post_content:
T206 "A" uthentics - great condition and John Frill

*T206 Steve Evans, SGCA, Pied350.  Great card, color, image - trimmed.  $25
*T206 Tom Downey, SGCA, Old Mill Back.  I can't figures the A here.  Beautiful card front and back!  $35
*T206 George Brown, Chicago Variation, SGCA.  I can't figure this one either - measures up well.  Another beautiful card both front and back.  $45 **SOLD**
*T206 John Frill, SGC30, SC 350460 (Fact 30).  Crease in lower left.  $25 **SOLD**

Email or PM, first.  Paypal "Payment Owed" preferred.  All prices include S & H.  Thanks for your time and interest!

Ed
